description: Second-placed York City ease to a 3-0 victory over lowly Wealdstone in the National League.
title: York City 3-0 Wealdstone
maintext:
Second-placed York City eased to victory over lowly Wealdstone in the National League.
The Stones were depleted by a flu bug affecting their squad but held out until first-half stoppage time, when a corner kick was headed on for Malachi Fagan-Walcott to smash in the opener.
York's second arrived in the 64th minute, Junior Luamba squaring for Josh Stones to score, and three minutes later it was three after Luamba was brought down in the box.
Ollie Pearce converted the penalty kick, and the same player thought he had added a fourth in the 76th minute but his effort was disallowed for handball.
